sections.purpose: To produce purified water (e.g., RO, DI, or ultrapure) for culture media and reagents.
sections.scope: Applicable to laboratory water supply in Microbiology.
procedure: Check feed water supply and pre-filters.
Switch ON the purification system and allow initial flushing as per SOP.
Monitor water quality parameters (resistivity, TOC, conductivity) on the display.
Collect purified water in clean, dedicated containers.
Perform periodic sanitization and cartridge replacement as indicated.
Record maintenance and quality checks in the system log.
precautions: Do not bypass any built-in safety or monitoring features.
Replace filters and cartridges only with approved components.
Prevent stagnation in storage tanks by regular use or recirculation.
Protect the system from freezing temperatures.
Follow manufacturer instructions for chemical sanitization.
